title: Must Be a Dream (6U20)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Spot an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. Heal up to 2 companions whose culture matches the revealed card. You may discard the revealed card.
Lore:	”'May the Grace of the Valar protect you.'”
Rarity:	U
